title: Where Excellence and Convenience Meet-ENERGY CORRIDOR
posting_body: This is a great floor plan for roommates, families or an extra space for a home office.
The Memorial is an open concept floor plan to entertain your guest.

The Memorial comes with crown molding, 9 ft. ceilings, ceramic entry, marble vanity counter tops, garden tub in each bathrooms, large walk in closet, full size washer/dryer in apartment along with built in microwaves, ice maker refrigerators and a bar counter top in the kitchen and a dining room that can fit a table of 4 to 6 people.
A large patio for sitting outside and enjoying the nature feel of living at The Lexington.
For our second floor apartment homes, the stairs are located inside the apartment which provides you with more liable space and special décor areas.
We are a pet-friendly community that doesn’t have any breed restrictions or weight limits.
Residents can also relax by the pool under the gazebo on those hot, stressful days.
The community has a clubhouse where residents can use the Wi-Fi or have a cup of Joe at the coffee bar.
Contact the leasing office today to schedule a private tour.
The other GREAT thing is that your rent of $1615 includes your Water, Sewer, Trash, & Pest Control...
*An Additional, refundable deposit amount may be requested per the results of your application screening*
